About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 8:30am-4:30pm; closed public holidays and Christmas - New Year period. Copying services for books, journals, reports, original records to A3, maps and plans. Referral to paid researchers is available. Introductory brochure available.

About.Acquisition focus: The data of the National Trust is site specific and is mostly contained in reports on survey and documentation of heritage sites. Register files are comprehensive. (80% in-house).

About.Major holdings: National Trust: Site Reports; Register files.
